extendedInfo.description: Gun Tracker gives you the ability to keep detailed records for your guns.  You can log things like the number of rounds fired, cleanings, etc as well as keep notes on individual range sessions.  Range and cleaning sessions are automatically organized according to the date they were entered but can be manually edited at a later time.Gun Tracker is completely free (ad supported) and allows you to store information for up to 5 guns.  The PRO version of Gun Tracker is also available allowing for storage of up to 40 guns as well as other bonus features.Current Features:* save the make/model, color, date acquired, purchase price, modifications, and serial number for each gun* 20 ammo slots to track how much ammo you have in your stash* save special notes for each gun* save rounds fired, cleanings, failures, and dry fires for each gun* save individual range sessions * save individual cleaning sessions * earning "badges" based on what you've entered into the app makes logging gun info fun!* e-mail all of the info saved for each individual gun* save 3 pictures for each gun* password protect your gun information* change the background to a variety of colors* backup all data to sd card which can then be emailed, uploaded to Dropbox, etc* NO automatic backup to any online servers.  You can manually backup data but otherwise, ONLY YOU have access to your sensitive gun informationI am consistently working to improve Gun Tracker.  If you have any questions or suggestions for Gun Tracker, don't hesitate to contact me through the options menu of the app.  If you encounter an error, please contact me so that I can fix it instead of leaving negative feedback.  Thanks.tags: gun, log, logger, track, tracker, firearm, weapon, ammo, database, serial number, range, dry, fire, rounds, ammunition, usage, diary, cleanings

reviews.title: It works but it\'s ugly and not secure!
reviews.comment: It functions as advertised as far as I can tell. Not impressed with the gun safe feature, not secure at all. Was able to pull all my gun data by just looking in the app files while the app was locked. Also, 4 digit pin with no limit on guesses makes it pretty easy to just guess the pin. It would also be nice to link the ammo to the gun. And last but not least the UI is horribly ugly. Doesn\'t seem like any work was really put into the design of the app.
reviews.author: Lance Killian

reviews.comment: Very handy for keeping track of current scope settings if you frequently switch loads.
reviews.author: Brandon Braun

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Super responsive dev, fixed an issue related to my not being able to import data to the paid version within a day. Support this developer!
reviews.author: Ron Deagle

reviews.title: Cannot get past opening screen.
reviews.comment: Opening screen appears but when any icon is selected   message appears that the application has stopped. Useless.
reviews.author: Brian Jones

reviews.title: Must have for gun owners
reviews.comment: Great app love it. If you have guns this is a must have app.

reviews.title: Well, it WAS a good app!
reviews.comment: A recent update removed the \'rounds fired\' from the range session so now it has to be entered into two places manually. I hate complaining about a free app, but I liked it before the update...Now? Not so much.
reviews.author: Perry Storkson

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: I already own the pro version...just updating this one so I have 5 more slots for my guns...lol.  Great developer...just recommend adding more slots on the pro. Thanks!
